title: Steamed clams with a fennel, wild garlic and chive sauce and sautéed samphire
description: James Martin’s simple clam dish makes for an impressive dinner party starter.
ingredients: 12 razor clams, scrubbed (discard any clams that do not close tightly when tapped)
500g/1lb 2oz clams, scrubbed (discard any clams that do not close tightly when tapped)
1 bulb fennel, 1/3 finely diced and 2/3 shaved on a mandolin or finely sliced and placed in iced water
2 plum tomatoes, skin and seeds removed and finely diced
